snippet.title: HEAVENSTRIKE RIVALS　Concept Movie
snippet.description:
https://www.facebook.com/hsr.en

HEAVENSTRIKE RIVALS –　‘FIRST LOOK’ VIDEO RELEASED
The video explains the basics of the game and includes a concept movie that shows the unique world of HEAVENSTRIKE RIVALS.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In anticipation of the global launch of the brand new tactical RPG multiplayer HEAVENSTRIKE RIVALS™ later this month

Currently in open beta in Australia, Canada, Ireland, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia and Indonesia, HEAVENSTRIKE RIVALS releases worldwide later this month.
An exclusive ‘Black Mage’ character token will be available to all players for a limited time during the launch period.
